title: Fearing violence, Facebook blocks users from creating new events near White House, Capitol and state houses
text: In a blog post that was updated Friday, the company said the action was meant to prevent people from using its platform to incite violence.

title: The Wall Street Journal: After user backlash, WhatsApp is delaying new privacy tools rollout
text: WhatsApp is delaying a controversial update to its privacy policy after backlash from some users over how it would share data with Facebook Inc. which owns the popular messaging service.

title: Stock Markets Fall After Bank Earnings; BlackBerry Gets a Facebook Lift
text: Earnings season didn't get off to a perfect start.

title: Facebook develops A.I. to predict likelihood of worsening Covid symptoms
text: AI researchers at Facebook claim they have developed software that can predict the likelihood of a Covid patient deteriorating or needing oxygen.

title: Facebook Stock Is Not Facing a Crisis but an Opportunity
text: Facebook stock has fallen on hard times but it always bounces back. This weakness is an opportunity to consider it long not a reason to flee.

title: Social media platforms could face regulation: Ozy Media CEO
text: Carlos Watson, Ozy Media CEO, and Ben Smith, New York Times media columnist, joins "Squawk Box" to discuss regulation of social media and Big Tech platforms after violent posts and bans.

title: The 7 Best Growth Stocks To Snap Up For 2021
text: Solidly in the category that's fueled the recent bull run, these seven growth stocks are likely to be on solid footing in the new year, too. The post The 7 Best Growth Stocks To Snap Up For 2021 appeared first on InvestorPlace.

title: Ignore What The Market Thinks, Facebook Is A Generational Buy Opportunity
text: Facebook shares have slid lower due to the recent events, facing increased scrutiny once again. The company's platforms remain the primary source for advertisers, with the best demographic reach. All-time high financials post its ad-boycott prove Facebook's resiliency.

title: 4 S&P 500 Stocks to Buy That'll Make You Richer in 2021
text: The stock market's benchmark index is packed with big-time value.
